TopicTitle: How to make the FX flame bigger?

Articles.Content:
[EDIT] I also have no idea if I posted this in the right area, feel free to move it if I did post this in the wrong place. I am new to the forums.

Hello! I am decided to join the modding community and have since produced two parts.

The first one I have finished and am not going to release, due to it being my first part. (Bad texturing and non-complex mesh)

My second part I also do not plan on releasing, but I have not quite finished it. One of the main reasons for not

having finished it yet being that I want to make the flame match up to the actual size of the exhaust valve.

Any clue on how to actually do this? I have posted this question in another part of the forums, but I received no answers as of yet.

Pictures of my rocket are in the other forum post as well if you want to see the problem I have encountered.

Thanks!

Edited June 22, 2013 by Mr.Desmond Tiny
